daily_fact: Grand Street Pizza in New York City is celebrating four successful years of serving delicious slices and fostering community connections in the vibrant neighborhood.
topline_md: Hurricane Melissa may affect New York City, coinciding with a Halloween forecast of rain and wind that could disrupt trick-or-treating, while cold temperatures and road closures from local festivals are also expected this weekend.

risks_alerts.title: Risks & Alerts
risks_alerts.summary_md:
### Risks & Alerts

- Hurricane Melissa may impact New York City; residents should stay updated on weather alerts. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Rain and wind expected on Halloween, potentially affecting trick-or-treating plans. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Cold temperatures expected in NYC; residents should dress warmly and prepare for winter conditions. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Road closures expected in NYC due to festival and parade activities this weekend. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
